item.title: Education
item.description: what to do here? Scroll / Click left or right to get more questions. Don't worry; there are no scores, and no data is recorded, so have fun! the question is... What was the share of female students in public schools in canton Zurich in 2020? 51.7% This is no correct. But please, give another try! 48.3% This is Correct!
